name: Mustang Aviation
about: Mustang Aviation is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing comprehensive and innovative aviation education. Our curriculum spans from private pilot to airline transport pilot certifications, utilizing a fleet of advanced aircraft including Diamond DA40s, DA42 twins, DA62 twins, and Cessna Citation Mustangs. We employ state-of-the-art Redbird Flight Simulations and Level D simulators to ensure realistic training experiences. Our instructors are certified and experienced, focusing on safety, proficiency, and enthusiasm for aviation. We offer flexible training programs, including on-site and remote instruction, and a mentoring system to guide pilots through various levels of certification. At Mustang Aviation, our goal is to produce highly skilled and safe pilots, ready to excel in the aviation industry.
